purpose: The email announces the 9th Working Formal Methods Symposium (FROM 2025) scheduled for September 17-19, 2025, in Iași, Romania. It aims to gather researchers and practitioners in the field of formal methods to share new theoretical results, methods, techniques, and frameworks. The symposium will feature invited speakers and a program that includes both invited lectures and regular contributions. Important dates for paper submissions, author notifications, and registration are provided, along with details on submission requirements and topics of interest.
